AT.name: Sports Island 3D
AT.description: Mit "Sports Island 3D" macht der neue Teil der "Sports Island"-Reihe von Konami und Hudson den Sprung von der Wii-Konsole auf den Nintendo 3DS. Jetzt können die Spieler eine Reihe von Sportarten auch unterwegs in stereoskopischem 3D erleben, ohne spezielle 3D-Brille. Dieses Spiel bietet mit seinen zehn verschiedenen Sportarten Spaß und Spiel für alle, die nach ernsten Disziplinen suchen, aber auch für diejenigen, die etwas schrägere und ungewöhnlichere Aktivitäten mögen. Zur Wahl stehen Fußball, Basketball, Tennis, Eishockey, Sumo-Ringen, Bowling, Trampolinspringen, Schneemobil-Rennen, Schneeballschlacht und Blasrohr-Zielschießen! Bei so einer vielseitigen Auswahl von Sportarten liegt es nahe, dass man jeweils eine spezielle Steuerung verwendet. Für das Blasrohr-Zielschießen nutzt man den Bewegungssensor des Nintendo 3DS, so dass man durch die Bewegung des Systems selber zielen kann. Wenn man das Ziel im Visier hat, pustet man ins Mikrofon, um den Pfeil abzuschießen und findet dann heraus, wie genau man getroffen hat. Wenn man aber z.B. schöne Figuren auf dem Trampolin springen will, muss man das Schiebepad, die Knöpfe und das eigene Gefühl für Timing einsetzen! Wer gerne zeigt, was er sportlich so drauf hat, freut sich sicher über das 'Super Play'-Feature, bei dem die Spieler, die gekonnt eine Reihe von Bewegungen durchführen, eine umwerfende Spezialbewegung ausführen können –wodurch sich das ganze Match vielleicht noch einmal auf den Kopf stellen lässt! "Sports Island 3D" bietet auch die Herausforderung verschiedener Einzelspieler-Modi, darunter 'Open Match', 'Random Match', 'Championship' und 'Tournament' - Sie können auch Ihr eigenes Team erstellen, das Erfahrung sammelt, und beim Spielen neue Techniken und Verbesserungen freischalten! Außerdem bietet das Spiel 'Lokales Spiel'– und 'Download-Spiel'-Modi für bis zu vier Spieler - so können zusätzlich bis zu drei Freunde mit nur einer Karte ins Spiel einsteigen.

AU.name: Sports Island 3D
AU.description: Konami and Hudson’s Sports Island series moves from Wii to Nintendo 3DS with the release of Sports Island 3D – allowing players to enjoy a variety of events on the go in glasses-free, stereoscopic 3D. With a roster of 10 different sports, this title delivers fun and games to players who enjoy serious disciplines, as well as to those who like their activities a little more wild and wacky. You can choose from football, basketball, tennis, ice hockey, sumo wrestling, bowling, trampolining, snowmobile racing, snowball fighting and blowgun archery! With such a range of sports on offer, it’s no surprise that each one has its own specific control scheme to master. Blowgun archery uses the Nintendo 3DS gyro sensor, allowing you to control your aim by tilting the system. Once you’ve found your mark, blow into the microphone to set your shot loose and see just how accurate you were. On the other hand, throwing brilliant shapes on the trampoline will see you using the Circle Pad, buttons and your own sense of expert timing only! Those who get a kick from showing off their mad sporting skills are sure to be pleased with the ‘Super Play’ feature, which allows players who can skilfully ace a succession of moves to unleash a stunning special manoeuvre - and maybe turn the tide of an entire match! Sports Island 3D has various Single Player modes to challenge you, including Open Match, Random Match, Championship and Tournament - you can create your own team, who will earn experience, unlocking new moves and upgrades as you play! On top of all this, the game supports both Local Play and Download Play for up to four players – so you and up to three of your friends can have a blast with just one Game Card.

BE.name: Sports Island 3D
BE.description: La série Sports Island signée Konami et Hudson passe de la Wii à la Nintendo 3DS avec la sortie de Sports Island 3D, qui permet aux joueurs de profiter d'une variété d'épreuves sportives où qu'ils soient, dans une 3D stéréoscopique sans lunettes. Avec 10 sports différents, ce titre garantit des heures de divertissement aux joueurs qui apprécient le sport réaliste, mais aussi à ceux qui préfèrent des activités un peu plus originales. Vous avez l'embarras du choix : football, basket-ball, tennis, hockey sur glace, lutte sumo, bowling, trampoline, course de motoneige, bataille de boules de neige et sarbacane ! Avec une telle variété de sports, il vous faudra maîtriser des commandes spécifiques pour chaque discipline. La sarbacane utilise le capteur gyroscopique de la Nintendo 3DS, vous permettant de maîtriser votre visée en inclinant la console. Une fois que vous avez pris vos marques, soufflez dans le microphone pour tirer, et mesurez votre précision. D'autre part, pour faire de splendides figures au trampoline, vous devrez maîtriser l'usage du pad de commande circulaire, des boutons, et faire preuve d'un sens du timing irréprochable ! Si vous préférez fanfaronner avec vos performances sportives extraordinaires, le mode 'Super Play' est fait pour vous : là, les joueurs qui enchaînent brillamment une série de mouvements peuvent exécuter une manœuvre acrobatique spéciale, et peut-être renverser toute la tendance du match ! Sports Island 3D vous propose divers modes de jeu en solo qui mettront vos talents à l'épreuve, par exemple : Open Match, Random Match, Championship et Tournament. Vous pouvez créer votre propre équipe qui gagnera de l'expérience et débloquera de nouveaux mouvements et des améliorations au fil du jeu ! Et ce n'est pas tout : ce jeu fonctionne aussi en mode multijoueur local et en mode téléchargement pour un maximum de quatre joueurs. Ainsi, jusqu'à trois amis peuvent vous rejoindre pour s'amuser avec une seule carte de jeu.

CZ.name: Sports Island 3D
CZ.description: Konami and Hudson’s Sports Island series moves from Wii to Nintendo 3DS with the release of Sports Island 3D – allowing players to enjoy a variety of events on the go in glasses-free, stereoscopic 3D. With a roster of 10 different sports, this title delivers fun and games to players who enjoy serious disciplines, as well as to those who like their activities a little more wild and wacky. You can choose from football, basketball, tennis, ice hockey, sumo wrestling, bowling, trampolining, snowmobile racing, snowball fighting and blowgun archery! With such a range of sports on offer, it’s no surprise that each one has its own specific control scheme to master. Blowgun archery uses the Nintendo 3DS gyro sensor, allowing you to control your aim by tilting the system. Once you’ve found your mark, blow into the microphone to set your shot loose and see just how accurate you were. On the other hand, throwing brilliant shapes on the trampoline will see you using the Circle Pad, buttons and your own sense of expert timing only! Those who get a kick from showing off their mad sporting skills are sure to be pleased with the ‘Super Play’ feature, which allows players who can skilfully ace a succession of moves to unleash a stunning special manoeuvre - and maybe turn the tide of an entire match! Sports Island 3D has various Single Player modes to challenge you, including Open Match, Random Match, Championship and Tournament - you can create your own team, who will earn experience, unlocking new moves and upgrades as you play! On top of all this, the game supports both Local Play and Download Play for up to four players – so you and up to three of your friends can have a blast with just one Game Card.

On top of all this, the game supports both Local Play and Download Play for up to four players – so you and up to three of your friends can have a blast with just one Game Card.

ES.name: Sports Island 3D
ES.description: La serie Sports Island, de Konami y Hudson, salta de la consola Wii a Nintendo 3DS con el lanzamiento de Sports Island 3D, un título que permite a los jugadores participar en una variedad de eventos deportivos tridimensionales sin la necesidad de utilizar gafas especiales. Con diez deportes diferentes disponibles, este título ofrece diversión tanto a los jugadores amantes de disciplinas serias como a los que prefieren actividades menos pesadas. Puedes escoger entre fútbol, baloncesto, tenis, hockey sobre hielo, sumo, bolos, trampolín, carreras por la nieve, peleas de bolas de nieve y tiro con cerbatana. Con tantos deportes entre los que elegir, no resulta sorprendente que cada uno tenga un esquema de control único que tendrás que aprender. El tiro con cerbatana hace uso del sensor de giro de Nintendo 3DS, lo que te permitirá apuntar al objetivo inclinando la consola. Cuando hayas dado con tu marca, sopla en el micrófono para disparar el dardo y comprobar tu precisión. Por otro lado, si lo que quieres hacer es dar saltos y más saltos en el trampolín, tendrás que utilizar el botón deslizante y los botones, amén de tu propio sentido de la oportunidad. Si lo que te gusta es demostrar tus increíbles dotes deportivas, te encantará la función 'Super Play', que permite a los jugadores que consigan dominar una serie de jugadas utilizar una maniobra especial que puede cambiar el ritmo del juego. Sports Island 3D tiene varios modos para un único jugador que te pondrán a prueba, como 'Open Match', 'Random Match', 'Championship' y 'Tournament'. Puedes además crear tu propio equipo, que irá ganando experiencia y podrá desbloquear nuevas jugadas y mejoras a lo largo del juego. Por si esto fuera poco, el juego cuenta tanto con el modo de juego local como con el modo descarga para hasta cuatro jugadores, así podrás jugar con tres de tus amigos con una sola tarjeta de juego.

IT.name: Sports Island 3D
IT.description: Con l'uscita di Sports Island 3D, la serie Sports Island di Konami e Hudson si sposta dal Wii al Nintendo 3DS, consentendo così ai giocatori di godersi una varietà di giochi in movimento e in 3D stereoscopico senza bisogno di occhiali speciali. Con ben dieci sport diversi, questo titolo offre divertimento e giochi sia a coloro che amano le discipline sportive, sia a quelli che preferiscono attività un po' più matte e stravaganti. Puoi scegliere tra calcio, pallacanestro, tennis, hockey sul ghiaccio, sumo wrestling, bowling, trampolino, gare di motoslitte, battaglie a palle di neve e tiro al bersaglio con la cerbottana! Con una così ampia varietà di sport disponibili, non sorprende che ognuna di queste attività abbia un suo sistema di controllo specifico da imparare a padroneggiare. Il tiro al bersaglio con la cerbottana utilizza il sensore di rotazione del Nintendo 3DS, che ti consente di controllare la mira muovendo la console. Una volta centrato il bersaglio soffia nel microfono per effettuare il tiro e guarda quanto sei stato preciso. Per eseguire magnifiche evoluzioni sul trampolino, invece, dovrai utilizzare il pad scorrevole, i pulsanti e tutto il tuo tempismo! Coloro che si emozionano nel mostrare le loro temerarie abilità sportive di sicuro apprezzeranno la funzione Super Gioco che consente ai giocatori particolarmente bravi a effettuare successioni di mosse di compiere una manovra speciale sbalorditiva, che potrebbe capovolgere le sorti di un'intera partita! Sports Island 3D offre diverse modalità per un giocatore con cui cimentarti, tra queste: Partita aperta, Partita casuale, Campionato e Torneo. Puoi creare la tua squadra e, man mano che giochi e guadagni esperienza, potrai sbloccare nuove mosse e potenziamenti! Come se questo non bastasse, il gioco supporta sia partite in locale che la modalità download per un massimo di quattro giocatori. In questo modo fino a quattro amici possono godersi il divertimento con una sola scheda di gioco.

You can choose from football, basketball, tennis, ice hockey, sumo wrestling, bowling, trampolining, snowmobile racing, snowball fighting and blowgun archery! With such a range of sports on offer, it’s no surprise that each one has its own specific control scheme to master. Blowgun archery uses the Nintendo 3DS gyro sensor, allowing you to control your aim by tilting the system. Once you’ve found your mark, blow into the microphone to set your shot loose and see just how accurate you were. On the other hand, throwing brilliant shapes on the trampoline will see you using the Circle Pad, buttons and your own sense of expert timing only! Those who get a kick from showing off their mad sporting skills are sure to be pleased with the ‘Super Play’ feature, which allows players who can skilfully ace a succession of moves to unleash a stunning special manoeuvre - and maybe turn the tide of an entire match! Sports Island 3D has various Single Player modes to challenge you, including Open Match, Random Match, Championship and Tournament - you can create your own team, who will earn experience, unlocking new moves and upgrades as you play! On top of all this, the game supports both Local Play and Download Play for up to four players – so you and up to three of your friends can have a blast with just one Game Card.

NL.name: Sports Island 3D
NL.description: De Sports Island-serie van Konami en Hudson komt van de Wii naar Nintendo 3DS, met Sports Island 3D. Dit spel laat je onderweg genieten van sportieve evenementen in stereoscopisch 3D, zonder de noodzaak van een speciale bril. Met een aanbod van 10 verschillende sporten kunnen zowel spelers die de voorkeur geven aan serieuze disciplines als spelers die meer van wilde en maffe activiteiten houden genieten van Sports Island 3D. Kies uit voetbal, basketbal, tennis, ijshockey, sumoworstelen, bowlen, trampolinespingen, sneeuwscooterracen, sneeuwbalgevechten en blaaspijpschieten! Met zo'n gevarieerde keuze aan sporten, zal het vast geen verrassing voor je zijn dat ieder evenement zich anders laat besturen. Bij het blaaspijpschieten wordt gebruik gemaakt van de gyrosensor van de Nintendo 3DS. Mik, blaas in de microfoon om je schot te lossen en kijk hoe nauwkeurig je was. En bij het trampolinespringen heb je niets anders dan de draaiknop, knoppen en je eigen gevoel voor scherpe timing nodig! Voor diegenen die een beetje een show van hun speelstijl willen maken is er de 'Super Play'-mogelijkheid waarmee spelers die op vaardige wijze een aantal bepaalde acties achter elkaar maken, een spectaculaire speciale beweging uit kunnen voeren - en misschien het tij van een hele wedstrijd kunnen keren! Sports Island 3D bevat verschillende standen voor een speler om je mee uit te dagen, waaronder Open Match, Random Match, Championship en Tournament, en creëer je eigen team dat tijdens het spelen ervaring opbouwt en nieuwe bewegingen en upgrades vrijspeelt! Naast dit alles ondersteunt het spel meerspelerstanden via zowel een lokale, draadloze verbinding als Download Play voor tot wel vier spelers, waardoor jij en drie van je vrienden van het spel kunnen genieten met slechts één Game Card.

NZ.name: Sports Island 3D
NZ.description: Konami and Hudson’s Sports Island series moves from Wii to Nintendo 3DS with the release of Sports Island 3D – allowing players to enjoy a variety of events on the go in glasses-free, stereoscopic 3D. With a roster of 10 different sports, this title delivers fun and games to players who enjoy serious disciplines, as well as to those who like their activities a little more wild and wacky. You can choose from football, basketball, tennis, ice hockey, sumo wrestling, bowling, trampolining, snowmobile racing, snowball fighting and blowgun archery! With such a range of sports on offer, it’s no surprise that each one has its own specific control scheme to master. Blowgun archery uses the Nintendo 3DS gyro sensor, allowing you to control your aim by tilting the system. Once you’ve found your mark, blow into the microphone to set your shot loose and see just how accurate you were. On the other hand, throwing brilliant shapes on the trampoline will see you using the Circle Pad, buttons and your own sense of expert timing only! Those who get a kick from showing off their mad sporting skills are sure to be pleased with the ‘Super Play’ feature, which allows players who can skilfully ace a succession of moves to unleash a stunning special manoeuvre - and maybe turn the tide of an entire match! Sports Island 3D has various Single Player modes to challenge you, including Open Match, Random Match, Championship and Tournament - you can create your own team, who will earn experience, unlocking new moves and upgrades as you play! On top of all this, the game supports both Local Play and Download Play for up to four players – so you and up to three of your friends can have a blast with just one Game Card.

On top of all this, the game supports both Local Play and Download Play for up to four players – so you and up to three of your friends can have a blast with just one Game Card.

PT.name: Sports Island 3D
PT.description: A série Sports Island, da Konami e Hudson, salta da Wii para a Nintendo 3DS com o lançamento de Sports Island 3D, que permite aos jogadores participarem numa variedade de eventos desportivos em 3D sem a necessidade de óculos especiais! Com dez desportos diferentes à disposição, este título oferece diversão tanto aos jogadores que gostam de disciplinas mais sérias como aos que gostam de atividades um pouco mais invulgares. Podes escolher futebol, basquetebol, ténis, hóquei no gelo, sumo, bowling, trampolim, corridas de motos de neve, lutas de bolas de neve ou tiro com zarabatana! Com uma gama de desportos tão grande à disposição, não é surpresa nenhuma que cada um tenha um esquema de controlos único que terás de dominar. O tiro com zarabatana faz uso do sensor de giroscópio da Nintendo 3DS, permitindo-te controlar o teu alvo inclinando a consola. Quando tiveres encontrado a tua marca, sopra para o microfone para disparares o teu projétil e vê o grau de precisão que conseguiste. Por outro lado, se o que queres é dar saltos e mais saltos no trampolim terás de usar o Botão Deslizante, botões e o teu próprio sentido de oportunidade! Os que gostarem especialmente de demonstrar os seus incríveis dotes desportivos ficarão contentes com a função "Super Play", que permite aos jogadores que consigam dominar uma sucessão de jogadas usarem uma manobra especial fantástica e talvez até darem a volta ao jogo! Sports Island 3D tem vários modos para apenas um jogador que te desafiarão, incluindo Open Match, Random Match, Championship e Tournament. Podes criar a tua própria equipa, que ganhará experiência e poderá assim desbloquear jogadas novas e upgrades ao longo do jogo. Para além de tudo isto, o jogo oferece as opções de Local Play e de Download Play para até quatro jogadores pelo que até três amigos podem divertir-se muito com apenas um cartão de jogo.
